title: Hour 2 - Brian Windhorst (06-23-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Brian Windhorst (06-23-20)
description:
ESPN SR Writer Brian Windhorst tells Dan that he doesn't know what the rules are for going to report on the NBA in Orlando. Brian says the worst case and scenario for the NBA is if one or more persons comes down with the corona virus and they have to shut the whole league down.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
